name: "Ember" Bundle ("Ember" tee + "Before the Sun Sets..." CD)
description: Can't get enough of the main character of our "Before the Sun Sets..." EP? Well this package is for you! The tee is a fitted Tutlex 0202 fashion tee (4.5 oz. 100% ring spun cotton). Available in S, M, L, XL, and 2XL. With beautiful album artwork throughout the "Digi-Pak" style CD, the look of the CD reflects the quality of the songs included within. The "Digi-Pak" case holds four panels of beautiful artwork and, of course, the "Before the Sun Sets..." CD. INCLUDES: - One (1) Black "Ember" Tultex 0202 Fahion Tee - One (1) first edition Pyro, Ohio "Before the Sun Sets..." CD - One (1) LIMITED EDITION Pyro, Ohio poster (11"x17") from our photo-shoot with Syke Shows SHIPPING: Item will be shipped within two (2) business day upon receipt of payment. INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING: If you don't see your country listed for shipping, please let us know and we will quote a shipping price for you. NOTE: The band is not liable for items lost, stolen, or damaged by mail carriers. If for any reason you are unhappy with your merch, please contact us directly and we will work with you to make it right.

name: "Hearts" Zip-Up Hoodie
description: Grab the hottest piece of Pyro, Ohio merchandise and keep yourself warm in the process! Printed on Tultex 0320 zip-up hoodie. Hoodie specs: 80% ring spun cotton/20% polyester, jersey lined hood with flat matching drawstring, muff pocket, ribbed cuffs and waistband with 5% spandex. INCLUDES: - One (1) Black "Hearts" Zip-Up Hoodie - One (1) LIMITED EDITION Pyro, Ohio poster (11"x17") from our photo-shoot with Syke Shows EXPECTED DELIVERY: Item will be shipped within two (2) business day upon receipt of payment. name: "Tree of Death" Shirt (2 Color Options)
description: The first official lyric shirt for the band, this shirt features imagery and lyrics from the first track off of the "Before the Sun Sets..." EP, "NY Spins." Printed on very soft and fitted Tutlex 0202 fashion tee (4.5 oz. 100% ring spun cotton). Available in S, M, L, XL, 2XL, and 3XL.
